title: Principles and Applications of 5G-Advanced Beam Prediction

context.prior_knowledge: Basic wireless communication concepts, foundational machine learning theory, and introductory signal processing
context.additional_context: Aims to cultivate understanding and practical application of 5G-Advanced core technologies in smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the necessity of beam prediction and technical challenges in 5G-Advanced environments.
Learners can diagram the operational principles of machine learning-based beam prediction algorithms (utilizing spatial correlations).
Learners can quantitatively analyze the impact of beam prediction technology on communication efficiency (e.g., reducing RS overhead by 75%).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
